transbit.tbits.upgrade
Interface IUpgrade

All Known Implementing Classes:
AttachmentUpgrade, Base64PasswdEncode, SynchronizeAttachments, UpdateTables, UpgradeQuartzJobData
public interface IUpgrade

A post or pre-hook of the Upgrade system needs to implement this Interface. This is either executed before or after the db upgrade but in the same transaction.

Author:
sandeepgiri

Method Summary
 boolean upgrade(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String folder, java.lang.String sysType)
          Runs the upgrade before or after the db upgrade.
 

Method Detail

upgrade

boolean upgrade(java.sql.Connection conn,
                java.lang.String folder,
                java.lang.String sysType)
                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                       DatabaseException,
                       TBitsException
Runs the upgrade before or after the db upgrade.

Parameters:
conn - The connection object which have/will run the db scripts
folder - The folder whose name is the version number.
sysType - The flavour of tBits which is being upgraded.
Returns:
true if successful or false if not. The upgrade done as part of the batch scripts will be rolled back for this version.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
DatabaseException
TBitsException
